nodes.text: Bestine was a city on Tatooine. Shortly before the Battle of Yavin, Obi-Wan Kenobi and Luke Skywalker spent a night in Bestine while on their way to Mos Eisley. The Tusken Raider Reirin encountered a hooded trader selling stolen goods in the city, who offered to get her offworld in exchange for stealing a crystal from a Jawa clan.
